message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $110. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but $110 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $105.  What do you think?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $108. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy it!
